snippet: Analysts say that the Russian president is angling to keep Ukraine as weak and decentralized as possible while he tries to restore his ties with the West.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin has focused on subjects like humanitarian aid when he speaks about Ukraine, shift that has led analysts to conclude that Russia has started playing waiting game; question has arisen of whether the West will continue to let clock tick away while Putin and his lieutenants patiently pursue their many goals in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Analysts say that the Russian president is angling to keep Ukraine as weak and decentralized as possible while he tries to restore his ties with the West.

headline.main: Seeing Cost of Saber Rattling in Ukraine, Putin Alters Course
headline.print_headline: After Seeing the Cost of Saber Rattling in Ukraine, Putin Alters His Course
